plot: Told in three separate but intertwined short films, "Basic Emotions" is a story of how four young Manhattan roommates deal with insecurities, create facades, express compassion and struggle...
title: Basic Emotions
plot_es: Told in three separate but intertwined short films, "Basic Emotions" is a story of how four young Manhattan roommates deal with insecurities, create facades, express compassion and struggle...
